Package game.Dinosaurs

Class Dinosaur

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.Dinosaurs.Dinosaur
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ActorInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
Allosaur, Brachiosaur, Pterodactyl, Stegosaur
public abstract class Dinosaur
extends Actor
An abstract class from which dinosaur actors inherit their abilities

  • Method Details

    • getIntrinsicWeapon

      protected IntrinsicWeapon getIntrinsicWeapon()
      Description copied from class: Actor
      Creates and returns an intrinsic weapon. By default, the Actor 'punches' for 5 damage. Override this method to create an Actor with more interesting descriptions and/or different damage.
      Overrides:
      getIntrinsicWeapon in class Actor
      Returns:
      a freshly-instantiated IntrinsicWeapon

    • getAllowableActions

      public Actions getAllowableActions​(Actor otherActor, java.lang.String direction, GameMap map)
      Description copied from class: Actor
      Returns a collection of the Actions that the otherActor can do to the current Actor.
      Overrides:
      getAllowableActions in class Actor
      Parameters:
      otherActor - the Actor that might be performing attack
      direction - String representing the direction of the other Actor
      map - current GameMap
      Returns:
      A collection of Actions.

    • behaviourLogic

      public Action behaviourLogic​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      governs usual dinosaur behaviours and how a dinosaur should interact with the environment depending on its attributes
      Parameters:
      actions - A list of possible actions the dinosaur can make
      lastAction - The last action the dinosaur made
      map - The game map
      display - The menu display for all actions
      Returns:
      an action for the dinosaur to do

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Description copied from class: Actor
      Select and return an action to perform on the current turn.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      the Action to be performed

    • corpseDespawn

      public void corpseDespawn​(Actor actor, GameMap map)

    • heal

      public void heal​(int points)
      Description copied from class: Actor
      Add points to the current Actor's hitpoint total. This cannot take the hitpoints over the Actor's maximum. If there is an overflow, hitpoints are silently capped at the maximum. Does not check for consciousness: unconscious Actors can still be healed if the game client allows.
      Overrides:
      heal in class Actor
      Parameters:
      points - number of hitpoints to add.

    • hurt

      public void hurt​(int points)
      Description copied from class: Actor
      Do some damage to the current Actor. If the Actor's hitpoints go down to zero, it will be knocked out.
      Overrides:
      hurt in class Actor
      Parameters:
      points - number of hitpoints to deduct.

    • addBehaviours

      public void addBehaviours()
      Adds all dinosaur behaviours to a behaviour arrayList

    • mature

      public void mature​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      enables the dinosaur to mature into an adult

    • hydrate

      public void hydrate​(int points)
      Hydrates the dinosaur for positive points values removes thirst points for negative point values
      Parameters:
      points -

    • isConscious

      public boolean isConscious()
      Description copied from class: Actor
      Is this Actor conscious? Returns true if the current Actor has positive hit points. Actors on zero hit points are deemed to be unconscious. Depending on the game client, this status may be interpreted as either unconsciousness or death, or inflict some other kind of status.
      Overrides:
      isConscious in class Actor
      Returns:
      true if and only if hitPoints is positive.

      map - the game map
      Returns:

      Parameters:
      actor - the actor that is pregnant
      pregnantTimer - the time spent pregnant
      map - the map on which the pregnancy is occuring
      Returns:

      Returns:
